verses.verse: When<WH3588> a man<WH376> has taken<WH3947> a wife,<WH802> and married<WH1166> her, and it come<WH1961> to pass that she find<WH4672> no<WH3808> favor<WH2580> in his eyes,<WH5869> because<WH3588> he has found<WH4672> some<WH1697> uncleanness<WH6172> in her: then let him write<WH3789> her a bill<WH5612> of divorce,<WH3748> and give<WH5414> it in her hand,<WH3027> and send<WH7971> her out of his house.<WH1004>
And when she is departed<WH3318> out of his house,<WH1004> she may go<WH1980> and be another<WH312> man's<WH376> wife.

And if the latter<WH314> husband<WH376> hate<WH8130> her, and write<WH3789> her a bill<WH5612> of divorce,<WH3748> and gives<WH5414> it in her hand,<WH3027> and sends<WH7971> her out of his house;<WH1004> or<WH176> if<WH3588> the latter<WH314> husband<WH376> die,<WH4191> which<WH834> took<WH3947> her to be his wife;<WH802>

No<WH3808> man shall take<WH2254> the nether<WH7347> or the upper<WH7393> millstone<WH7347> to pledge:<WH2254> for he takes<WH2254> a man's life<WH5315> to pledge.<WH2254>

If<WH3588> a man<WH376> be found<WH4672> stealing<WH1589> any<WH5315> of his brothers<WH251> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and makes merchandise<WH6014> of him, or sells<WH4376> him; then that thief<WH1590> shall die;<WH4191> and you shall put<WH1197> evil<WH7451> away<WH1197> from among<WH7130> you.

Take heed<WH8104> in the plague<WH5061> of leprosy,<WH6883> that you observe<WH8104> diligently,<WH3966> and do<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> shall teach<WH3384> you: as I commanded<WH6680> them, so you shall observe<WH8104> to do.<WH6213>
Remember<WH2142> what<WH853> <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> did<WH6213> to Miriam<WH4813> by the way,<WH1870> after that you were come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4714>
When<WH3588> you do lend<WH5383> your brother<WH7453> any<WH3972> thing,<WH4859> you shall not go<WH935> into<WH413> his house<WH1004> to fetch<WH5670> his pledge.<WH5667>
You shall stand<WH5975> abroad,<WH2351> and the man<WH376> to whom<WH834> you do lend<WH5383> shall bring<WH3318> out the pledge<WH5667> abroad<WH2351> to you.
